website_summaries.verdict: As long as you have plenty of light, the Nikon Coolpix L120 is a nice camera for snapshooters in love with long lenses.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix L120 offers a wide, long lens, AA batteries for power, and simple operation at a reasonable price
cons: The L120 has mediocre photo quality above ISO 200

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of the photos taken with the camera for the cost of the camera. I expected a lot more from a NIKON product. Usually NIKON provides superior quality.. but this was just a big disappointment. The camera is easy to use and portable.. but the picture quality is just poor. The photos were grainy and lacked any vibrancy. I expected crystal clear, stunning photos. I did not keep this camera. I can not recommend this particular NIKON device and would suggest you seek for an alternative at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kalee

customer_reviews.title: Battery ??????  Really what the hell  ??/
customer_reviews.text: So i ordered this camera and it came in today,, I open the box and find just the camera and a "Sony" lith batter in a big ziplock bag with some paper wrapped around it ,,, No manuel ,No charging cord and anything else so i am like ok, lets put the battery in and see what happens, wow-- it takes 4 AA batteries, not the "Sony" battery that came in the package ,,,,,Hmmmm says on the add that is comes with a lith Battery,, But it does not fit the camera ,, USELESS NO Manuel of any kind to explain this issue ,,, BAD Sales ,,,,,
customer_reviews.author: rovbarrett

customer_reviews.title: Used and abused with great results.
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday camera. I take it Kayaking, hiking, and all my everyday adventures. It takes amazing pictures. I love the anti vibration which is essential in telephoto shots. It takes low light pictures that turn out great. The sport mode is just the ticket for taking pictures of birds in flight, I took one of a dolphin leaping out of the water I couldn't have captured otherwise. I want to purchase a DSLR however I plan on continuing using this one in the field as I'm not afraid to get it wet or dirty. Since Nikon has it upgraded several times the price has dropped dramatically. So it is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Boxer fan

customer_reviews.title: but I am a very happy shopper with this selection
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional photographer! Nor I know much about cameras, but I am a very happy shopper with this selection. This camera has an amazing zoom, and amazing quality of pics. I followed all the recommendations in feedback below and this camera follows me wherever I go! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nili Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Was going on a once in a lifetime trip to Thailand and Cambodia and wanted to be able to show my family back home what I saw and experienced... and I wanted to record it with something better than your typical pocket digi camera. This camera ended up being perfect. I took some amazing pics.... in less than 3 months I took over 1000 pictures. I especially loved the Continuous Sport function... takes 8-15 rapid fire pictures.... great for capturing motion... especially cool motion like a Muay Thai fight or a tiger running through a pool of water to pounce another tiger. I cannot think of any cons... good camera and easy to use. I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Oetken

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just the result of a company who cares about quality, market targets and solid products. If you want to compare this camera vs another brand you'll probably find thousand of points in your favor.. For me it turns out that this is the best camera I've ever order after my all life camera MAMIYA Professional with double focus.. The optical zoom is impressive and the quality picture resolution is something that amazing.. I'm not a pro and I feel like one everytime I take a picture. I recommend you to buy the extra memory cartridge in case you want to record videos. the navigation menu is easy to use. I'm very happy with my product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Guerreo Moya

customer_reviews.title: My favorite digital camera yet
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I've had it for quite a long time now & it is my favorite. I've had many digital cameras and have always been frustrated by some aspect of them--either they take bad pictures in low light or they're difficult to work with etc. This camera does everything well. It takes great videos & pictures. It takes great pictures in low light & even better in natural light. It gives the user a lot of options to customize their photos & to adjust their photos. There are a lot of easy to use, helpful settings--especially for catching things that are fast moving.
customer_reviews.author: The Jeschkes

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has wanted a decent camera for a long time. She's not a professional photographer, but she was sick and tired of the shoddy pictures her low-end digital cameras always gave her. She was nervous about getting a pro camera that she wouldn't know how to handle. Can't take great pictures if you can't figure the darn thing out. I did a quick google search and found this camera. It is the PERFECT mix of professional, and amateur. It gives you creative control over your images without needing a degree in photography. She is so pleased with her images now, and carries it with her everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. Got it on sale here. This Nikon takes great pictures for the price. Has an excellent zoom, a bonus feature on the camera is that it has a button to adust the zoom on the top and the side of the camera. Camera is nice and compact. Havent tried all the shooting modes yet but I can say that the sports shooting is better than I had expected it would be, takes pictures fast and the quality remains good. The video recording also works good. Video and sound is real clear but the zoom ocould be a little better in video shooting mode. The flash works really well.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made on a camera. I have always had small digital cameras. Now that my little boy is a toddler I needed something with a good zoom, good quality pictures, and to capture a picture while he runs and plays. Well this camera does all of the above. I was debating on spending close to $500 for a Canon or Nikon with more options. I am glad I didn't because this does exactly what I needed one for. I am electronic savvy but new to learning about camera functions. This camera is easy to use and figure out. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Has a mind of its own
customer_reviews.text: The camera replaces a Canon A-70 which until its display failed, took better focused pictures. Plus the Canon has a viewfinder which helps composition. I cannot rely on the Nikon's display to tell me that I am focused. I have also used a Nikon FE, a Rolleicord, Polaroids and a 4x5 view camera and I know what is necessary for good exposure, focus and composition. I don't blame the L120 for being out of focus or for not using the flash but I feel like I am trying to hack or debug it even after reviewing the instructions. This camera is handicapped by its automation.
customer_reviews.author: sometimes savy

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for a real estate appraiser
customer_reviews.text: I am a real estate appraiser and really like this camera. It uses 4 AA batteries, so I'm never caught in the field with a dead proprietary battery. The zoom is very good and the wide angle is great for interior photos of homes. It locks on focus fairly quickly, though not as quick as a dSLR; good enough for what I do. The only issue I have is that it doesn't do well with sunlight glare. I wish Nikon would make an optional "hood" for it. I also have to set the exposure one click on the + side since picture tend to come out just a smidgen too dark. Other than that I'd definitely recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Gray

customer_reviews.title: actually a used camera sold as new
customer_reviews.text: While the camera itself seems to be in good condition, the condition of the box(original packaging) clearly indicated that this was a camera someone had received as a gift and didn't want. The box the camera came in ( not the package it was then shipped in) was torn apart. This was a problem because I was giving it as a gift. Also, it was described as new. The whole thing was shipped in a padded envelope, which worked out ok but was not a good choice for shipping a $300 camera.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: sweet camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would pass along that, after a short learning period, this camera takes amazing pictures easily and efficiently!! I would recommend this or any of Nikon's cameras. This particular device was in my budget and has added to my creative endeavors in a very big way! Thank you Amazon. It is easy to adjust pictures with the software that comes with it and camera adjustments virtually took me 10 minutes to get comfortable with.
customer_reviews.author: mark dalton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice at photography and my main subjects are outdoors: birds, scenery, sometimes the occasional family get together. My new Nikon is replacing a larger and bulkier camera. It is easy to use and takes great pictures. I love the zoom on it, it really gets close to the action. It is lighter weight than my previous camera. I love the option of no flash. My previous camera would pop up and flash even though I had set it not to flash. The menus are easy to navigate and set your options. A great camera at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few days before my kids birthday party and it arrived quickly and thankfully VERY easy to use! The image quality is great - and I was very happy with the camera! I have gone through 3 digital cameras in the last few years and for this or that reason they stop working so I decided to check out ratings and look for a GOOD camera for once and this one is GREAT quality for a wonderful price! I highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Faye Hejduk

customer_reviews.title: great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera with more zoom, easy to use & small enough to easily travel with, this camera meets all the criteria. I received this camera last week and from the pics I have taken it takes great pics of closeup photos of nature i.e. flowers, birds etc. I am a senior and I can say this camera was very easy to setup and easy to use. I would definitly recommend this to anyone. This is a great camera for its price!
customer_reviews.author: JudinSD

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have used for a month or two. I like it. Still figuring out all the bells and whistles but so far, so good. Instructions are simple to follow. Doesn't come with any memory card so buy this package also on Amazon...."16GB Essential Accessory Package For Nikon Coolpix L110 L120 L100 Includes 16GB Memory, Case, Tripod, 4 AA High Capacity NIMH Rechargeable Batteries +". Very good bargain and functional.
customer_reviews.author: naturesson

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix L120 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: this is my second one for the price I like it, works good when you setup correctly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has made me into a picture-taking fanatic. It is super easy to use, with a zillion nifty features I never knew existed. Now I'm taking phenomenal pictures of birds, flowers, and just about every interesting thing I can find. A very nice step between standard point-and-shoot cameras and the money-hungry SLR cameras. The only improvements I'd like are manual focus and white balance.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Like New - Bought for Granddaughter and She Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Looks like new as stated in article. Fast delivery. Bought for our Granddaughter and and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: JDW

customer_reviews.title: Captures precious moments
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing for the price. I've had issues with the camera focusing correctly sometimes. It usually has to due with the auto focus. If you change the lighting it normally fixes it. But beyond that, this camera takes amazing pictures. It is easy to use, I use the auto function mostly, but has plenty of options if wanted.
customer_reviews.author: britbrat

customer_reviews.title: ... this camera few years back and it has been great! I think it's the best digital camera ever ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera few years back and it has been great! I think it's the best digital camera ever plus it's not that expensive. Sharp pictures you can even take pictures of the moon with with tripod! Very awesome product and good made. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Takes good pictures auto focus you can also buy lenses for it to take pictures as well
customer_reviews.author: Rachel duran

customer_reviews.title: excellent, but closer to a point and shoot I ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent, but closer to a point and shoot I think than a bridge...no wheel, no iso choice, just set sccenes, and there are a lot, and it does pretty darn good :) Beautiful images for reg shots, and pretty good with macro and zoom, but gotta be careful and patient...not good for lightening storms :) A++ nice camera for sure :) The seller I got mine from used, was amazing, came so fast, and it looked brand new :) Great deal!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie LaVan

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures, it takes a little getting used to. you need to hold the camera absolutely still to get a perfect picture, if you move a little the picture will turn out a little blurry. otherwise it is a great picture and takes really good pictures especially with the 21 optical zoom. It gets really good close up pictures.
customer_reviews.author: computer guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm into photography, and I decided to finally bite the bullet and buy a nice camera. Only an SLR was a little out of my reach, but then I found this camera. Its perfect for those photographers who want a high resolution, tons of shooting modes, and a great 21 times zoom. If an SLR camera is out of your reach, BUY THIS CAMERA! Also battery life is excellent, I use my camera constantly, and still haven't needed to replace batteries (camera still says batteries are full) since getting it two weeks ago. Only downside is it takes AA's. But I just bought rechargeable AA's with a cheap charger. Big screen on back too.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera.
customer_reviews.text: I have use it a lot and the pictures are great. When is dark pictures quality is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L Rivera Ramos

customer_reviews.title: COOLPIX is an apt name for this camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera. I wasn't sure I was buying the right camera for what I wanted to do but this is just exactly what I wanted. It's amazingly easy to use, takes GREAT pictures, and the video feature is the best. I love how easy it is to record video with this camera. And the mic picks up sound easily. The only thing I would add to this camera is a volume control to boost up the sound when taking video. My husband likes the 20X zoom feature. Brings everything right to you. I would totally recommend this camera to anyone thinking of upgrading their point and shoot. This camera is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used mostly for concert photography...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased primarily to take photos at concerts. At times photos turn out dark and adjustment of settings is limited to be able to correct the problem. Also has trouble focusing on subjects quickly to capture sudden action shots. Other than its flaws it is a decent camera and I'm still able to get some amazing shots with it, but I'd still like to find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: love it totally
customer_reviews.text: the best camera one can get with great pictures in fact closer to the images of an dslr and with such low price. great zoom, prefect picture quality... can take good pictures in dark as well... in fact a very good camera for everyday use. being a mother of a toddler i like to carry my camera in my bag and this camera completely serves the purpose. as other users have pointed about some minor cons, but i guess u have to be a pro to notice that... the only negative aspect is that this camera needs AA batteries, but that can be overcomed by using rechargeable batteries. i must say great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: docmom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Nikon Coolpix L120 last month after much deliberation between buying a Nikon or Canon. As a magazine publisher, I wanted a camera that would give me SLR quality at a digital price for my casual photos. This was a great choice. I took a photo of a painting when the room was completely blacked out (dark) and with flash the photo came out clear as day. All my photographs are crisp and look lifelike when I zoom in on my photo viewer. The resolution is excellent!!! My one small issue is the image stabilization which is not in the lens but apart from that this camera is excellent. Worth every penny!!! Do not hestitate to buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Have to play around with the settings!!
customer_reviews.text: My mother has had this camera for months now, and i just got done borrowing it from her for a couple days. I have to say I thought the same thing as the negative reviewers when she first got this camera. It seemed like way too many were blurry.. I am happy to say that after months of her owning it, and probably having a few different people change settings and things like that, this is the best camera I've used. I didn't get one blurry shot while using it to take pictures of my 3 year old (still, and dancing)I will be buying one of my own within the next week. I highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: mommakris

customer_reviews.title: A great multi purpose easy to use camera.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I each have one of these. I use mine for closeups a lot for online selling and for other business. It takes great pictures in the auto mode and focuses within a foot to foot and half for sharp detailed pictures. My wife takes familiy pictures of great quality with the auto click and shoot capabiliy. If you are a non camera person and want a great compact camera to take great pictures indoor and out, close and distant, this is an excellent one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Provider

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value
customer_reviews.text: Folks, this is an excellent camera for the price. Just the right balance between style and substance - perfect for a technology simpleton like myself. The images even at low resolutions are terrific. Controls are intuitive and the greatest surprise was of course the video - excellent imagery along with a really good microphone. Additional features that I really liked were of course the fact that this baby takes regular AA batteries and the preset features work like a charm - just point, zoom a little here and there and shoot. If you are looking for an camera under $300 that will give you terrific images and video without having to learn a new language - this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Vman

customer_reviews.title: It's a great camera & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's a great camera & easy to use. I've had a similar camera before so I know how to use it already. I got it for half the original price--just $50--so it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: My daughter needed a camera to take on a school ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a camera to take on a school trip to Europe so this was it. However we can never seem to get clear pictures on a consistent basis. Maybe we just don't know how to use it properly. Anyway, it takes pictures, lots of pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Not user-friendly
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures, but isn't user-friendly. I'm still figuring out how to use it. And now I have to press down the "click" button so hard to take a picture it gets people annoyed and I have missed several pictures because of that feature
customer_reviews.author: Arielviola

customer_reviews.title: The NIKON Reputation is Well Deserved
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful...and my initial use has not disappointed in fact it exceeds my expectations in terms of exceptionally "sharp" images.
customer_reviews.author: DRVS

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, used it on a trip to Peru. Good zoom range ... operation controls a bit confusing.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Point and Shoot, BUT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as a step up from her small Nikon P&S....assumed it had a viewfinder, bit it does NOT so all shots must be made via the live view screen on back. Image quality is superb, and for the money it's a good buy.My mistake in researching this camera, also not as many manual options as i would have liked. Takes standard AA's though- always a plus, especially when traveling. Recommended, just be aware of what you're buying.
customer_reviews.author: G. Scholl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: At the begining i just try to buy for the brand, and when i got it, o my god it's amazing and you can do a lot of things with it. If you are not a pro you will feel like one with this camera, to be honest it's the best camera i have had in all these years.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Carvallo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: This camera is pretty easy to use it is not really a point and shoot you need to know how to use it I had to contact someone that had one like this. The pictures are very blurry if you do not have the flash on. I do not like this at all. But it takes very good pictures when you have the flash up.
customer_reviews.author: beccoble

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was great right from the start. It works nicely, good size, and it has great image quality!!! Its easy to use, easy to figure out, and it has great battery power. There are different options when it comes to the image (you can set it to snow, dusk daylight, black and white sports, etc.) I could not have chosen a better camera and i highly reccomend it. GET THIS CAMERA....... you will not be disapointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jcb

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nikon Cookpix L120 . I was looking for something that offered more than a point and shoot but not so complicated that it was frustrating for a beginner. I read all the reviews from others who had purchased and decided on this one. I have been very pleased with it and my pictures have come out great. I have had some trouble with blurring on some but I really think that it is me and not the camera. I especially love that I can do some beautiful close ups of flowers , birds and they are so clear and sharp! good camera
customer_reviews.author: gracie

customer_reviews.title: All around good camera.  VERY user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great all around camera. This is very user friendly, and the manual is very easy to read. Sometimes has a problem with focusing after zooming out, but shutting it off and turning it back on will usually fix that. For beginners, I would recommend using the auto adjust setting. This camera has many features, including built in Vibration Reduction Technology. Recommend trying different features before using it in an everyday application such as ball games or plays. Over all I would give this a 4.5 out of 5 possible stars.
customer_reviews.author: average joe

customer_reviews.title: Nikon is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been through everything three deployments, camping, hiking, hunting, fishing trips and still works as good as the day I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: donald archambault II

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camera! It has everything I could have asked for in a small point-and-shoot. To be so compact, the full range of features offered are incredible. I would not hesitate to recommend this product to anyone. In fact, I already have.
customer_reviews.author: InMyTime

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Like this camera, bought it used on Amazon. Only problem I've encountered is occasionally it will take two pictures in a row when I push down button to take a picture
customer_reviews.author: P. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix Nikon L110
customer_reviews.text: The camera is fantastic..it takes awesome pics and the videos are superb! The only discouraging feature is not being able to take dual sports pics at once. It take multi-pics, however, it seems like it is too fast when taking the shots, therefore the subject pictured seems to only move 5/100 of an inch at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Chapt1

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I gave this camera to ourselves for Christmas and have already fallen in love! It is so easy to use and works well in a variety of settings. It takes great nighttime pictures and continuous shots. The zoom feature is outstanding and takes crisp, clear pictures from many yards away. We are very happy with our purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: VA Reader & Crafter

customer_reviews.title: Best Low end camera I have seen for the price
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 slr cameras and wanted one more portable yet retained an acceptable quality. This met every expectation actually it exceeded my hopes very easy to use both with still pictures and video quality. Great product would highly recomend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Is a nikon
customer_reviews.text: It is a nikon. Great digital camera. The lens is of excellent quality as well as the optical stabilizer. The video is acceptable. The blast is acceptable. Great low light performance. It has a high performance in moving shots. Alkaline Battery life is good, use Flash greatly reduces the battery life. I recommend buying nmh batteries
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Quiros A

customer_reviews.title: Loving the camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Arrived sooner than expected with more extras than expected and in better condition than expected. Wonderful experience.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera! I love it! All perfect, te camera is 100% funtional! Good seller and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Glendy Madera

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera. The button to take a picture has ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. The button to take a picture has to be pressed very very hard now that is a year and a half old.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren P.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: My sister has needed a new camera for a while, so I took the opportunity to buy her this one. She fell in love with it at the store, so giving her this was amazing! She almost passed out!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Marie Tremonte

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera as a gift for my nephew in Romania. He really likes it. I have seen some of the pictures he took with this camera and they look even better than the ones my Canon camera takes. Great brand!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera! Only downside so far is that the screen scratches easily and my screen protector won't stay on that well, but I'll find a way to fix that. Otherwise it's a great buy! Really enjoying it!
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Leech

customer_reviews.title: Nikon L120
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter a few weeks ago. So far she loves it. Consumer Reports rated it very high, that is why I purchased it. It is a great camera for the price! :)
customer_reviews.author: photography

customer_reviews.title: Eh,
customer_reviews.text: Battery life doesn't last at all with this camera. Even after getting brand new batteries they go bad in about 2 weeks. /: I don't know I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiah

customer_reviews.title: okay for every day, feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: This camera works okay for fun shots of my kids. Nothing heavy duty. Although the resolution is great! The buttons and casing feels like cheap plastic. Also I don't like that the lense pops open everytime you turn in on. I always forget to take off the cover and it gets stuck. Oh another this is I would rather have a camera you could charge instead of always having to change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Vitale

customer_reviews.title: NICE! NICE! NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Camera for the price. Pictures crystal nice features. A few things could be improved but then again, want a better camera pay more and buy one. This camera is super nice for its price. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: SPES

customer_reviews.title: more camera than first impression
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement camera. Having the instructions in written form is a great help. The original had instructions on a disk. Not having a viewfinder but rather a screen on the back takes some adjustment. Or maybe I just have shakey hands. Learning to keep every thing steady requires some effort. There is a lot more to this camera than the Kokak z712 although the 712 is more intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: john lee barrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly to the picture. Nice photos. Easy handle. The camera itself was in excellent condition and came boxed with all the required cables battery, leads etc. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: BAs

customer_reviews.title: pictures no good
customer_reviews.text: This product was a dispointment, have been on two cruises with it, pictures just do not turn out well, smaller compact camera does better for sharpe pictures, stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: MR B

customer_reviews.title: Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Best dam Camera I ever owned. It takes professional pictures that are second to none. So glad I purchased this specific one!
customer_reviews.author: BryteVisuals

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice and easy to use camera. But it only has 720P video recording capability. I am a little disappointed. Zoom range is BIG. Zooming speed control is a little too rough, not precise enough. Overall it's a well made camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of the two zoom options didn't work, luckily it has two.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent photographic camera was my Christmas
customer_reviews.text: needed a photographic camera and they recommended this model and it is very good, excellent quality and meets all I need at a great price
customer_reviews.author: ELIECER CHAVEZ RETANA

customer_reviews.title: OK

customer_reviews.text: I bought it because my mother in law need a speed camera to take a picture of my 5 years old nice. Than I bought another for my wife, but this nikon surprised me. It's fast, take great pictures, lite, easy to use, film better than my old camera, than I have 2 in 1. I only didnt like the AA battery. I always need have AA batterys with me, and take to much time to replace it when the battery finish when used it to film.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Nikon Pick
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on Sunday afternoon and it was delivered on the following Saturday afternoon. Just in time for my upcoming camping trip and football game weekend. This camera does all it says it can do. I love it. Perfect for someone like me who's not a professional but still wants ample shooting options. A little slow to re-focus on the zoom. Thats the only con I can see. Takes great pictures and allows you to edit them right on the camera. Coolpix L120 is the bomb.com!!

customer_reviews.title: Definite recommendation

LCD quality is amazing, and the zoom is wonderful for this camera. It's a comfortable hold and isn't too awkward. Very happy with my purchase and would recommend it for the shutter-happy (not necessarily for the advanced though) :)

It is much better than the other point and shoots she had before, but not quite as sophisticated as a DSLR. It's a great option for something in between the two. Would definitely recommend this for the casual photographer.

customer_reviews.title: Kodachrome
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best affordable point & shoot on earth. Made for smaller hands than mine but I got over it. Easy controls. feature rich. I like it. Optical zoom is dead on. A little slow on final focus but not enough to be annoying. For the money. Yes.

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix L120 Digital Camera (Black)
product_meta.description:
Get closer than ever to your active family with the powerful, affordable Nikon Coolpix L120 Your images will zoom to the next level with its 21x optical Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens. 

Zoom in on a high powered camera at an easy to handle price. 

Great photos and superb HD movies begin with Nikon's high power 21x wide-angle optical Zoom-NIKKOR glass lens. This powerful zoom lens, with a 25-525mm range equivalent, closes the distance between you and your subjects. Capture your son firing off the game-winning lacrosse shot or your daughter's first ride on a two wheeler. Whether it's a panoramic shot of the entire family on a favorite sledding hill, or a photo of your children playing in the backyard, you'll shoot effortlessly and accurately with the Coolpix L120. 

If you're new to photography, no worries, this camera has intelligent features to help you out. Five-way VR Image Stabilization uses sensor shift to minimize the effects of camera shake, virtually eliminating blurred images. Trick-or-treating with the kids? The Coolpix L120 has a high ISO speed up to 6400 to capture fast moving or low-light scenarios. 

One-touch HD movie recording puts friends and family in motion. 

As photo keeper of family memories, you can rely on the Coolpix L120 to capture great still images that you can print and save. But a band concert without sound is incomplete and a 60-yard touchdown drive without the fleet-footed runs isn't as exciting. That's where the Coolpix L120's advanced One-Touch HD Movie recording capabilities come in. With the push of a button you'll instantly be shooting 720p HD movies in full stereo. While shooting you can activate the camera's zoom function to capture tight shots and close ups. And when you're ready to share your movies with family and friends, you can use in-camera playback or the convenient HDMI output for simple hookup to an HDTV or computer. 

Shoot snowboarders, Frisbee throwers and T-ball players with a single, versatile
feature_bullets: 14.1-megapixel CCD sensor for superb image quality
EXPEED C2 for enhanced image quality and processing speed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars335 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
